author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves accessing and reviewing logs from the vulnerability management system to identify any anomalies or unauthorized activities related to vulnerability assessments and remediation efforts. It is crucial for understanding the security posture of the organization and detecting potential security incidents.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.

title: Access Vulnerability Management System Logs

references.name: NIST SP 800-92: Guide to Computer Security Log Management
SANS: Log Management and Analysis Best Practices
CISA Hunt and Incident Response Program - Log Analysis
MITRE ATT&CK: Data Sources for Detection
